segments.text: Have you got any outdoor interests ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . My only recreation is skateboarding .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I know it . It is included in extreme sports . I think it's too dangerous for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe . But it emphasizes participation and a spirit of courage , and can give one the extreme sense of cheerfulness and success . I'm getting to like the game more and more .
segments.speaker: S2
